response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is worth $1,200,000 to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth to both of us, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. I am confident that this offer represents a fair and advantageous deal for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
